title: VLS Environmental Solutions opens waste-to-energy facility in Quartzsite - Arizona Big Media
summary: VLS Environmental Solutions has launched a waste-to-energy processing facility in Quartzsite, AZ, aimed at providing sustainable waste management services along the west coast. The facility processes industrial, non-hazardous waste from various industries to create alternatives to coal and natural gas. CEO John Magee highlights the company's focus on zero-waste practices and innovative solutions, reaffirming their commitment to sustainability. The Quartzsite facility represents a significant milestone in delivering secure and environmentally friendly waste management solutions.
green_innovation: TRUE - The facility represents a green innovation as it transforms operational waste into sustainable energy alternatives, thereby addressing waste management issues while promoting environmental sustainability.
